title: Waste Management's Fish on Adapting to Recycling Crisis (Audio)
itunes:title: Waste Management's Fish on Adapting to Recycling Crisis (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Jim Fish, President of Waste Management, on the company's earnings, the recycling “crisis” and where the company is headed to overcome and adapt.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
